song_lyrics: Yogī tamārā snehbharyā din, āve chhe amne yād...
Karnu e laṭku ne mukhnī madhurtā,
Almast Yogīne sambhāryā karu... āve chhe 1
Prem mūrti Yogīne pūjyā karu... āve chhe 2
Nirmānī Yogīne vandan karu... āve chhe 3
Evā Pramukh Swāmīne rījhavyā karu... āve chhe 4
title: Yogī tamārā snehbharyā din āve chhe amne yād

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-127: unknown

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
